chargers.connect_error_text: Connecting to charger {{charger_id}} failed with code {{status}}: {{response}}

register.name: Name
register.accecpt_privacy_notice: I have read, understood and I am accepting the privacy notice.
register.save_recovery_data_text: Since we can only decrypt the access code with the correct password we need this file to recover access to your chargers in case of a password loss. Save this file in a safe location which is inaccessible by others since it is equivalent to your password.
register.success_alert_text: You should receive an email in the next couple of minutes.
register.error_alert_text: Failed to start recovery with status {{- status}}: {{text}}
